column2: [From.GetTitledName] will abdicate to a loyal German priest
§RThe Saxon nobles are preparing for war§!
§YWe shall take no stance in this conflict, however we may always change our mind.§!
This is the leader of the Ghibbelines
This tis the leader of the Ghibblines
Ruler is in same faction as me
Ruler is leader of my faction
We will call our faction members to war against the Emperor
War for Primacy over Imperial Investiture
The Guelphs and Ghibbelines have been struggling against eachother for a while in the empire. With tensions high as ever it is time to eliminate the other faction!
Our advesaries hold lands next to us, which is interfering with our operations and influence in the area. If we were to fight a skirmish for the area we could get the land under our own control.
